catalog_metadata.name: ICP cluster on VMware
catalog_metadata.description: Deploy ICP on Vmware and MCM Klusterlet
catalog_metadata.longDescription:
Deploy ICP on chosen topology [Single node, Medium with multi worker node and Full HA]
Deploy MCM template on new ICP
Deploy helm chart to connect MCM kubelet to MCM controller
catalog_metadata.author: admin

tags.name: Request_Group
tags.label: Request_Group
tags.description: The current context group id of the current user that requested the provisioning of the template. This is important because a user may be part of more than one group and this identifies the context of which group the user made the request.

tags.name: Request_User
tags.label: Request_User
tags.description: The user id of the current user that requested the provisioning of the template.

tags.name: Service_Name
tags.label: Service_Name
tags.description: Name provided for the service instance by the end user at time of request

tags.name: Service_Identifier
tags.label: Service_Identifier
tags.description: Unique identifer generated by ICAM which is mapped to the service instance of the template provisioned.

actions.name: Provision
actions.description: Default action for deployment of service

input_parameters.name: enable_kibana
input_parameters.label: Enable Kibana
input_parameters.description: To enable kibana on ICP cluster, select true

input_parameters.name: enable_monitoring
input_parameters.label: Enable Monitoring
input_parameters.description: To enable monitoring on ICP cluster

input_parameters.name: singlenode_memory
input_parameters.label: Single node memory (RAM)
input_parameters.description: Node  memory for single node topology

input_parameters.name: singlenode_vm_ipv4_gateway
input_parameters.label: Single node vm IPv4 gateway
input_parameters.description: IPv4 Gateway for Single node vm

input_parameters.name: singlenode_vm_ipv4_prefix_length
input_parameters.label: Single node vm IPv4 prefix length
input_parameters.description: IPv4 prefix length / subnet mask for single node VMs

input_parameters.name: singlenode_vm_disk1_datastore
input_parameters.label: Datastore name
input_parameters.description: VMware datastore name for VM deployment

input_parameters.name: vsphere_resource_pool
input_parameters.label: vSphere Resource Pool
input_parameters.description: Resource pool name of vSphere to deploy VM on

input_parameters.name: vm_folder
input_parameters.label: vSphere folder
input_parameters.description: Folder name to place the vm on vSphere

input_parameters.name: boot_hostname_ip
input_parameters.label: Boot node hostname and IPv4
input_parameters.description: ICP boot node hostname and IPv4 address

input_parameters.name: boot_memory
input_parameters.label: Boot node memory
input_parameters.description: Boot node VM memory or RAM

input_parameters.name: boot_vm_ipv4_gateway
input_parameters.label: Gateway IPv4 address
input_parameters.description: ICP node VMs network gateway IPv4 address

input_parameters.name: boot_vm_ipv4_prefix_length
input_parameters.label: IPv4 prefix length or Subnetmask
input_parameters.description: Network subnet mask or prefix length

input_parameters.name: singlenode_hostname_ip
input_parameters.label: single node hostname ip
input_parameters.description: Hostname and IPv4 address for single node VM

input_parameters.label: Enable metering
input_parameters.description: To enable metering on ICP cluster

input_parameters.label: Enable glusterFS
input_parameters.description: To enable glusterFS on worker node
